talents.name: +1x Brewed Up multiplier for Drunken Brawler
Cinder Brew applies Fear when ignited

abilities.desc: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.
abilities.lore: A slam of Mangix' mighty keg starts the festivities.

abilities.desc: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignite once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger. Dealing or receiving magic damage extends Brewmaster's Brewed Up duration.
abilities.lore: The Order of the Oyo's solution to all problems - another round!

abilities.desc:
Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls, gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies when Brewed Up.
Earth Brawler - Grants 1 armor and 5% Magic Resistance. Bonuses are 3x when Brewed Up.
Storm Brawler  - Grants 15% evasion and 5% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are 3x when Brewed Up.
Fire Brawler  - Grants 20% chance to critical strike for 145% of your attack damage and 10 Attack Speed. Crit Chance and Attack Speed is 3x when Brewed Up.
 Void Brawler  - Grants 5% bonus Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a 10% Slow for 2s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are 3x when affected by Cinder Brew.
abilities.lore: When Mangix won his title as the Brewmaster of the Order of Oyo, he also claimed his place in the mastery of inebriation.

abilities.desc:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves 1600 range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by 50%. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a 100% cooldown penalty. 

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.

attrib.header: MOVEMENT SLOW WHEN OUT OF RANGE:

abilities.lore: Mangix doesn't hold to it by rule, but he vaguely recalls an old master musing that, if one could manage, scaring up a companion was always preferable to drinking alone.

abilities.desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 4 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.
abilities.lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.

hero_aghs.scepter_desc:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves 1600 range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by 50%. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a 100% cooldown penalty. 

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.
hero_aghs.shard_desc: Increases Primal Split duration and allows it to be cancelled early.
